PrivacyHold.name: PrivacyHold
PrivacyHold.description: Represents a Privacy Hold that indicates that a record should be preserved from masking or deletion by Data Management policies in Privacy Center.

EndDate.description: The date the Privacy Hold ends.

IsActive.description: Indicates if Privacy Hold is active on the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the Privacy Hold.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.

PrivacyHoldReasonId.description: The ID of the associated Privacy Hold Reason.

ReferenceRecordId.description: The ID of the record marked for the Privacy Hold.

ReferenceRecordType.description: The type of object the record with the Privacy Hold is associated with.

RegisteredDate.description: The date the Privacy Hold was added to the record.
